entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Contrecoeur
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:59 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.4°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
